posts.post_content:
Hi all, I’m looking to buy a common back Matty portrait in the 1-1.5 grade range, depending on price. No pin holes or tears, and not interested in a beater or altered example. Some paper loss or wrinkles are ok. I prefer graded but would consider raw, as well. I found an SGC 1 on ebay that’s tempting but wanted to check here first.

PM me if anyone out there has one for sale!

Thanks!

Bump, still looking. Looking for fair to fair+. No pin holes, tears or alterations/trimming. Raw or graded.

Thanks
